question: Which among the following is not correct about longitudinal dunes?
option1: They extend at the right angle to the direction of the wind
option2: They are called as seif dunes in Sahara
option3: They develop in areas where wind velocity is slightly higher
option4: They are a result of the depositional action of the wind.
answer: They extend at the right angle to the direction of the wind
explanation: Longitudinal winds are formed at the direction parallel to the wind. Extending to several kilometres, they are also called as seif dunes in sahara.
